statements: SELECT * FROM telecom_infrastructure ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location FROM telecom_infrastructure WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT id, location FROM telecom_infrastructure WHERE status = 'Inactive';
SELECT * FROM telecom_infrastructure WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total FROM telecom_infrastructure;
SELECT id, location, status FROM telecom_infrastructure WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM telecom_infrastructure WHERE location LIKE '%NY';
SELECT * FROM telecom_infrastructure WHERE status = 'inactive' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, location FROM telecom_infrastructure WHERE id > 100 AND status = 'active';
SELECT id, location FROM telecom_infrastructure WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM telecom_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM telecom_locations WHERE owner = 'Company ABC';
SELECT location_name, longitude, latitude FROM telecom_locations WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT location_name, owner FROM telecom_locations WHERE latitude > 35.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
SELECT location_id, location_name, owner, latitude, longitude FROM telecom_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM telecom_locations
SELECT location_id, location_name, owner FROM telecom_locations WHERE owner = 'Company ABC'
SELECT DISTINCT owner FROM telecom_locations
SELECT location_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM telecom_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC
SELECT location_name, owner, status FROM telecom_locations JOIN telecom_status ON telecom_locations.location_id = telecom_status.location_id
SELECT * FROM telecom_locations;
SELECT id, location_name, status FROM telecom_locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM zoning_regulations ORDER BY regulation_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT id, regulation_name, last_updated FROM zoning_regulations WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM telecom_locations WHERE status='Active';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM telecom_locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT * FROM telecom_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, last_updated, created_by FROM zoning_regulations WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';

SELECT location_name, compliance_status, last_checked FROM telecom_locations JOIN environmental_compliance ON telecom_locations.id = environmental_compliance.location_id WHERE compliance_status='Compliant';
SELECT * FROM telecom_locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM telecom_locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT address, latitude, longitude FROM telecom_locations WHERE longitude < -80;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT location_id, regulations FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE regulations LIKE '%telecom%';
SELECT * FROM telecom_locations WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -70.0;
SELECT location_id, address FROM telecom_locations ORDER BY address DESC;
SELECT location_id, status, update_time FROM telecom_status WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE compliance_status IN ('pending', 'compliant') ORDER BY compliance_status, regulations ASC;
SELECT zone_id, jurisdiction, description FROM zoning_regulations WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, location, status FROM telecom_towers;
SELECT * FROM antennas WHERE height > 100;
SELECT name, description FROM regulations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT inspector, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE tower_id = 1;
SELECT permit_number, start_date, end_date FROM permits WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM telecom_towers;
SELECT id, location FROM telecom_towers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT tower_id, type, height FROM antennas WHERE height > 100 ORDER BY height ASC;
SELECT name, description FROM regulations WHERE name LIKE 'Permit%';
SELECT tower_id, inspector, inspection_date FROM inspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
